::KitKat::

She fell asleep in the chamber.  Her mind reeled in blurr of dreams 
and memories.  She mumbled in her sleep,"nooo, get to out."

She turned and twitched in her sleep.  She winced as she turned  in 
her sleep.  Her ribs still hurt and would take a while to heal.

She dreamed of Drillbit's proposal to her.  She whispered in her 
sleep,"Yes."

She then dreamed of killing Megatron for deserting his group to die. 
She dreamed that she had him cornered and shot at him with her optic 
lazars.  She shot at him again and again.  She saw his lifeless body 
there and she smiled. "You stay a leader by sticking with your team, 
not just leave them to die."  She chuckled in her sleep a little at 
the thought of getting even with Megatron.
